Class Heuristics

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ggp.base.player.gamer.statemachine.sample.Heuristics

  • public class Heuristics
extends java.lang.Object
    Class containing the evaluation functions used by FabulousPlayer.
    Author:
    Nicolai, Irme
